channel.title: Menus?
channel.description: can someone show me how to add a menu that pops up when you log in like on testscape. :confused:

item.title: Menus?
item.dc:creator: @legendzpker legendzpker
item.description:
@legendzpker wrote:

Purpose:to make a newspaper

Classes Modified:client.java

Difficulty:5/10

Assumed Knowledge:How to type, know What client.java is

Server Base:testscape many work on all

Step 1:
Search in client.java

public void commandHelp()

Remove it and add this it should look like this

public void Newspaper() { sendQuest("@dre@NEWSPAPER NAME", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dre@TITLE", 8147); sendQuest("@dbl@NEWS HERE.", 8149); sendQuest("@dbl@NEWS HERE", 8150); sendQuest("@dbl@NEWS HERE.", 8151); sendQuest("@dre@----Latest Updates----", 8153); sendQuest("@dbl@Here are the latest updates", 8155); sendQuest("@dbl@WRITE THE LATEST UPDATES HERE.", 8156); sendQuest("@dbl@WRITE THE LATEST UPDATES HERE.", 8157); sendQuest("@dbl@WRITE THE LATEST UPDATES HERE.", 8158); sendQuest("@dre@-----Future Updates-----", 8160); sendQuest("@dbl@WRITE THE FUTURE UPDATES HERE.", 8162); sendQuest("@dbl@WRITE THE FUTURE UPDATES HERE.", 8163); sendQuest("@dbl@WRITE THE LATEST UPDATES HERE", 8165); sendQuest("@dre@If you have a suggestion that you think is good,", 8167); sendQuest("@dre@post in the forums at WEBSITE HERE ", 8169); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

Add this with you other commands:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("newspaper")) { Newspaper(); }

There all done wasent that easy

Credits: 100% me

that will show up when u type ::newspaper to change it just change the command and only the command

Read full topic

well i dont have enough time to tell u that so ill tell u how to edit em. find wat command u need to open that page then go to client java and go find that command. first search for customcommand(to search press ctrl+f)then search again for the command and then find some word u remember from the command on server and change em. to confusing??post and i will fix
